subject: No Titles
text:
You said 
this was it.

The fog over the 
shoulders will 
sweep the profiles.

You did not know 
how to give, and I 
would not know, how 
to take.

Maples, pears, and ginkgos
will show the fallacy 
of colors in autumn.

And you, unblinkingly 
watch a 
poet's dilemma.

And I would just only stare 
into your eyes.
